jobDescription: Bring to the table win-win survival strategies to ensure proactive domination. At the end of the day, going forward, a new normal that has evolved from generation X is on the runway heading towards a streamlined cloud solution. User generated content in real-time will have multiple touchpoints for offshoring

• Collaborated with development team to optimize application architecture for scalability and maintainability
 • Analyzed user requirements and derived software design and performance requirements for web applications • Implemented automated testing and deployment processes, reducing deployment time by 30% • Debugged existing software and corrected defects, improving application stability by 25%

• Developed Proof-of-Concept and MVP projects to validate new architectures and solutions, resulting in a 50% reduction in development time • Completed programming and performed testing and debugging applications, resulting in a 15% reduction in post-deployment bugs • Designed, developed, and deployed web applications on AWS platform using EC2, S3, Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB • Improved web application performance by 20% through implementation of scalable and fault-tolerant systems on AWS
